SQL.LOAD: SELECT cbu.comm_brkdwn_upload_id, cbu.upload_session_id, cbu.record_number, cbu.validation_errors, cbu.dealer_id, d.company_id, cbu.effective_date, cbu.expiration_date, cbu.allowed_markup_pct, cbu.tolerance, cbu.company_group_id, cbu.position, cbu.entity_id, cbu.entity_name, cbu.phone, cbu.email, cbu.address1, cbu.address2, cbu.city, cbu.region_id, cbu.postal_code, cbu.country_id, cbu.display_id, cbu.tax_id, cbu.commission_entity_type_id, cbu.payment_method_id, cbu.account_name, cbu.bank_country_id, cbu.payment_reason_id, cbu.branch_name, cbu.bank_name, cbu.bank_sort_code, cbu.iban_number, cbu.swift_code, cbu.account_type_id, cbu.bank_id, cbu.account_number, cbu.bank_lookup_code, cbu.transaction_limit, cbu.bank_sub_code, cbu.branch_digit, cbu.account_digit, cbu.branch_number, cbu.bank_tax_id, cbu.payee_type_id, cbu.markup_percent, cbu.commission_percent, cbu.compute_method_id, cbu.created_date, cbu.modified_date, cbu.created_by, cbu.modified_by FROM elp_comm_brkdwn_upload cbu, elp_dealer d WHERE cbu.dealer_id = d.dealer_id and cbu.comm_brkdwn_upload_id = :comm_brkdwn_upload_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_comm_brkdwn_upload SET upload_session_id = :upload_session_id, record_number = :record_number, validation_errors = :validation_errors, dealer_id = :dealer_id, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, allowed_markup_pct = :allowed_markup_pct, tolerance = :tolerance, company_group_id = :company_group_id, position = :position, entity_id = :entity_id, entity_name = :entity_name, phone = :phone, email = :email, address1 = :address1, address2 = :address2, city = :city, region_id = :region_id, postal_code = :postal_code, country_id = :country_id, display_id = :display_id, tax_id = :tax_id, commission_entity_type_id = :commission_entity_type_id, payment_method_id = :payment_method_id, account_name = :account_name, bank_country_id = :bank_country_id, payment_reason_id = :payment_reason_id, branch_name = :branch_name, bank_name = :bank_name, bank_sort_code = :bank_sort_code, iban_number = :iban_number, swift_code = :swift_code, account_type_id = :account_type_id, bank_id = :bank_id, account_number = :account_number, bank_lookup_code = :bank_lookup_code, transaction_limit = :transaction_limit, bank_sub_code = :bank_sub_code, branch_digit = :branch_digit, account_digit = :account_digit, branch_number = :branch_number, bank_tax_id = :bank_tax_id, payee_type_id = :payee_type_id, markup_percent = :markup_percent, commission_percent = :commission_percent, compute_method_id = :compute_method_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE comm_brkdwn_upload_id = :comm_brkdwn_upload_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_contract_upload ( upload_session_id, record_number, validation_errors, dealer_id, effective_date, expiration_date, allowed_markup_pct, tolerance, company_group_id, position, entity_id, entity_name, phone, email, address1, address2, city, region_id, postal_code, country_id, display_id, tax_id, commission_entity_type_id, payment_method_id, account_name, bank_country_id, payment_reason_id, branch_name, bank_name, bank_sort_code, iban_number, swift_code, account_type_id, bank_id, account_number, bank_lookup_code, transaction_limit, bank_sub_code, branch_digit, account_digit, branch_number, bank_tax_id, payee_type_id, markup_percent, commission_percent, compute_method_id, created_by, comm_brkdwn_upload_id ) VALUES ( :upload_session_id, :record_number, :validation_errors, :dealer_id, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :allowed_markup_pct, :tolerance, :company_group_id, :position, :entity_id, :entity_name, :phone, :email, :address1, :address2, :city, :region_id, :postal_code, :country_id, :display_id, :tax_id, :commission_entity_type_id, :payment_method_id, :account_name, :bank_country_id, :payment_reason_id, :branch_name, :bank_name, :bank_sort_code, :iban_number, :swift_code, :account_type_id, :bank_id, :account_number, :bank_lookup_code, :transaction_limit, :bank_sub_code, :branch_digit, :account_digit, :branch_number, :bank_tax_id, :payee_type_id, :markup_percent, :commission_percent, :compute_method_id, :created_by, :comm_brkdwn_upload_id )
SQL.LOAD_PREVALIDATED_COMM_ENTY_BRKDWNS_FOR_: SELECT cbu.upload_session_id, c.company_id, cbu.dealer_id, cbu.effective_date, cbu.expiration_date, cbu.allowed_markup_pct, cbu.tolerance, cbu.company_group_id, cbu.compute_method_id, totals.comm_percent_total, totals.markup_percent_total FROM elp_comm_brkdwn_upload cbu, elp_dealer d, elp_company c, ( Select Dealer_Id, Sum(commission_percent) as comm_percent_total, Sum(markup_percent) as markup_percent_total From elp_comm_brkdwn_upload group By Dealer_Id ) totals WHERE cbu.dealer_id = d.dealer_id and d.company_id = c.company_id and cbu.dealer_id = totals.dealer_id and cbu.upload_session_id = :upload_session_id Group By cbu.upload_session_id, c.company_id, cbu.dealer_id, cbu.effective_date, cbu.expiration_date, cbu.allowed_markup_pct, cbu.tolerance, cbu.company_group_id, cbu.compute_method_id, totals.comm_percent_total, totals.markup_percent_total ORDER BY cbu.dealer_id asc

SELECT comm_brkdwn_upload_id, upload_session_id, dealer_id, position, record_number FROM elp_comm_brkdwn_upload WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id AND upload_session_id = :upload_session_id ORDER BY position asc
SQL.UPDATE_PREVALIDATED_COMM_ENTY_BRKDWN_REC: Update elp_comm_brkdwn_upload set validation_errors = :validation_errors where comm_brkdwn_upload_id = :comm_brkdwn_upload_id
